column4: OK. Dumb question, how to I check if Apache Tomcat is even running? I don't think it's auto starting.
ps aux should show everything that's running (there must be an easier way to find out though)
Cool, that'll do for now thanks :) Thought there would be a test page/port somewhere but I'll find that out later
try opening 127.0.0.1 in a browser and you should see "it works" or similar
